heroSubtitle: A modern crypto payment gateway that plugs into any e-commerce setup. Add your wallets, generate payment links, use the API, and receive crypto fast and securely.
goLiveTitle: Go live in three simple steps
goLiveSubtitle: Getting started with DynoPay takes minutes, not days. Here's how simple it is.
goLiveCard1Description: Set up your business profile and configure your payment preferences in minutes.
goLiveCard2Description: Connect BTC, ETH, LTC, and more. All your assets managed in one secure place.
goLiveCard3Title: Generate Payment Links or Integrate API
goLiveCard3Description: Create instant payment links for non-dev teams or use our developer-friendly API.
featuresTitle: All you need for your business
featuresSubtitle: Focus on your business and let us manage your crypto payment processes for you.
feature1Description: Simple way to send a payment request without any technical setup.
feature2Description: Real-time tracking of all crypto payments with detailed insights.
feature3Description: Manage all your crypto assets in one unified place.
feature4Description: Clean keys management and comprehensive documentation.
feature5Description: Transparent tier system and real-time fee monitoring.
feature6Description: For businesses that need automation and real-time updates.
whyChooseSubtitle: Built for modern businesses that want to accept crypto without the complexity.
whyChoose1Description: Minimal blockchain costs, nothing hidden. Save more on every transaction.
whyChoose2Description: Crypto goes directly into your own wallets. Non-custodial by design.
whyChoose3Description: Payment links for non-dev teams, powerful API for developers.
whyChoose4Description: Let customers pay from anywhere in the world, instantly.
useCaseSubtitle: See how different businesses use DynoPay to accept crypto payments.
useCase1Description: Straightforward crypto checkout for your online store.
useCase2Description: Easy one-time payments for courses, templates, and downloads.
useCase3Description: Automated callbacks and API for recurring payments.
useCase4Description: Multi-wallet support and clear transaction flow.
useCaseBannerSubtitle: Set up your workspace, add your wallets, and go live within minutes. Join thousands of businesses already accepting crypto.
